title: Ms office through college email?
content: I ordered my laptop but I forgot to add ms office like I selected the free trial one , can I access ms office by using college email at pes? Or should buy it separately

comments.body: I tried getting one through the university mail id but apparently we can only use the online version with it..
The problem is you can't open documents directly after downloading since the offline version isn't covered under our university mail id.
